questions.question: 1. What types of services does AlphaDevs offer?
questions.answer: We offer complete technology solutions, including institutional websites, e-commerces, web systems, mobile apps, SaaS, artificial intelligence, automations, digital marketing, cloud infrastructure, cybersecurity, and software/hardware maintenance. Our focus is delivering custom solutions that truly boost the client's business.

questions.question: 2. How much does it cost to develop a website or system?
questions.answer: The cost depends on the project type, features, and complexity. For example: Landing Pages start at $1000, Institutional Websites at $3000, E-commerces at $8000, Web/SaaS Systems at $20000. Each project is evaluated individually, ensuring the best value.

questions.question: 3. What is the average project delivery time?
questions.answer: It depends on the scope and service type: Landing Page: 7-15 business days, Institutional Website: 15-30 business days, E-commerce / Web System: 30-90 business days. Custom projects (AI, SaaS, Cloud): timelines defined after the briefing. We work with a clear schedule and constant follow-up.

questions.question: 4. Do you provide contracts and invoices?
questions.answer: Yes. All projects and plans include a service agreement and electronic invoice issuance, ensuring transparency and security for both parties.

questions.question: 5. Can I customize my service package?
questions.answer: Sure! Our packages are flexible. You can adjust or combine services according to your needs—for example, combining maintenance + SEO + paid traffic or infrastructure + SaaS + cybersecurity.

questions.question: 6. What is included in the monthly package fee?
questions.answer: Each plan includes a fixed set of services, but all feature: Continuous technical maintenance, Specialized support, Monthly reports, Security updates. More advanced packages also include cloud, automations, and AI.

questions.question: 7. Does AlphaDevs also offer hosting and domain registration?
questions.answer: Yes! We can manage all hosting and domain aspects of your project, including: Server configuration, SSL certificates, Corporate emails, Automatic backups. All hosted on scalable and secure cloud servers.

questions.question: 8. Do you develop mobile apps too?
questions.answer: Yes, we develop native and hybrid apps (Android & iOS) using Flutter and modern technologies, fully integrated with the client's web system or SaaS platform.

questions.question: 9. How does technical support work?
questions.answer: Support can be provided via email, chat, or phone, depending on the contracted plan. Basic plans: support during business hours. Business/Enterprise plans: 24/7 support and priority for tickets.

questions.question: 10. Does AlphaDevs handle SEO and digital marketing?
questions.answer: Yes. We have specialists in SEO, paid traffic (Google Ads / Meta Ads), marketing automation, and conversion optimization. We can manage your entire digital presence, from the website to campaign and lead management.

questions.question: 11. Do you work with Artificial Intelligence and automations?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer AI solutions, chatbots, computer vision, machine learning, and process automation (like integrations between systems and automated workflows via API, Zapier, Make, etc.).

questions.question: 12. Can I hire only infrastructure or cloud services?
questions.answer: Yes. If you already have a system, we offer hosting, DevOps, backup, and cloud monitoring services (AWS, Azure, GCP). We also perform server migrations and performance optimization.

questions.question: 13. Is there a loyalty period or cancellation fee?
questions.answer: No! Contracts are monthly and without a loyalty period, and can be canceled at any time with 15 days' notice. For annual plans, we offer exclusive discounts and special conditions.

questions.question: 14. Can I upgrade my plan?
questions.answer: Yes. You can switch to another package (e.g., from Starter to Business) at any time—the new price is adjusted proportionally.

questions.question: 15. How can I request a quote?
questions.answer: Just visit the 'Contact' page or click 'Request a Quote' on the website. You can describe your project, attach references, and state your estimated budget. Our team will contact you within 24 business hours with a custom proposal.

questions.question: 16. Do you develop custom projects?
questions.answer: Yes—it's our specialty. We work on custom projects according to the client's needs: tailor-made design, features, integrations, and structure.

questions.question: 17. Do you serve clients outside Brazil?
questions.answer: Yes! We serve international clients in Portuguese, English, and Spanish, with billing in Real, Dollar, or Euro, and integration with international payment methods.

questions.question: 18. What technologies does AlphaDevs use?
questions.answer: We use modern and stable technologies, such as: Python (Django, FastAPI), JavaScript (React, Node.js), Flutter, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS, Azure, Power BI, REST APIs, and AI integrations.

questions.question: 19. How does software maintenance work?
questions.answer: Maintenance includes: Security updates, Bug fixes, Performance improvements, Backups & monitoring, Regular technical support. All documented in monthly reports.

questions.question: 20. Does AlphaDevs partner or outsource projects?
questions.answer: Yes! We work with B2B partnerships, marketing agencies, freelancers, and software companies looking to outsource development stages with quality assurance.

questions.question: 21. How can I contact AlphaDevs?
questions.answer: You can contact us via: 🌐 alphadevs.dev/contact, ✉️ contact@alphadevs.dev, 📱 WhatsApp (direct link on the site). Our support hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM (BRT).
